channel.title: Development on Data Automation
channel.description: Recent content in Development on Data Automation

item.title: Automatic workflow to develop plugins and themes for WordPress
item.description: A good workflow can reduce hours with project maintenance in WordPress. This post will present one possible way to organize a project using templates and Gulp, a task runner.

item.title: Static sites with Jekyll and Github Pages
item.description: Websites are rarely built from scratch. There are many tools and frameworks which provide built in structures to build and publish websites on the internet. This post will present Jekyll, a static site generator, and how to use it in conjunction with Github Pages to publish sites on the internet with no cost.
